name: GHERKER
tagline: Mix and Match your Gherkin Recipe
body:
### GHERKER.
Gherker stands for Gherkin Maker. This simple and powerful tool will help writing ATDD using Gherkin language easy and intuitive. This tool enable re usability of existing step definitions by using real-time suggestions.   

This little tool solution is in my kitchen getting ready every minute. It will be out very soon.

### Authors and Contributors
Please contact @rinshadkk for more details.

### Support or Contact
